title: Premium on gross area at the rate of 5% of land rate in Annual Statement of Rates of the said land without considering the guidelines therein shall be paid to the Authority
clause_text: Premium on gross area at the rate of 5% of land rate in Annual Statement of Rates of the said land without considering the guidelines therein shall be paid to the Authority.
